text: Federico Castañeda Sonora (born November 24, 1984) is a Minor League Baseball pitcher with the Diablos Rojos del Mexico of the Mexican League. He bats and throws right-handed. ==Career== On November 28, 2008, Castañeda was signed by the Kansas City Royals to a Minor League contract. In 2012, he was loaned out by the Royals to the Diablos Rojos del Mexico in the Mexican League. As a relief pitcher Castañeda he appeared in 51 games posting a record of 2-4 with an ERA of 5.71 and 52 strikeouts. He was claimed by the Padres organization on December 6, 2012 as part of the Rule 5 draft. ==References== ==External links== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Arizona League Royals players Category:Baseball players from Coahuila Category:Diablos Rojos del México players Category:Mexican expatriate baseball players in the United States Category:Mexican League baseball pitchers Category:Naranjeros de Hermosillo players Category:Northwest Arkansas Naturals players Category:Omaha Royals players Category:Omaha Storm Chasers players Category:Rieleros de Aguascalientes players Category:Sportspeople from Torreón Category:Tomateros de Culiacán players Category:Vaqueros Laguna players
title: Federico Castañeda
